com.hms_networks.americas.sc.thingworx.utils

Class TWTimeOffsetCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hms_networks.americas.sc.thingworx.utils.TWTimeOffsetCalculator

  • public class TWTimeOffsetCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for calculating the offset between local time and UTC.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    HMS Networks, MU Americas Solution Center

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static long timeOffsetMilliseconds
      Time offset in milliseconds between local time and UTC.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TWTimeOffsetCalculator() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void calculateTimeOffsetMilliseconds()
      Calculate the local time offset in milliseconds and store in timeOffsetMilliseconds.
      private static void generateLocalTimeFile()
      Generates a local time offset file using an HTTP connection to the HTML file generated in writeLocalTimeHTMLFile().
      static long getTimeOffsetMilliseconds()
      Gets the currently stored time offset in milliseconds.
      private static long parseOffsetFromLocalTime()
      Parses and returns the generated local time offset file from generateLocalTimeFile().
      private static void writeLocalTimeHTMLFile()
      Create an HTML file that can be used to read local time via ScheduledActionManager.GetHttp(String, String, String).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getTimeOffsetMilliseconds

        public static long getTimeOffsetMilliseconds()
        Gets the currently stored time offset in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        time offset in milliseconds
        Since:
        1.0

      • calculateTimeOffsetMilliseconds

        public static void calculateTimeOffsetMilliseconds()
        Calculate the local time offset in milliseconds and store in timeOffsetMilliseconds.
        Since:
        1.0

      • writeLocalTimeHTMLFile

        private static void writeLocalTimeHTMLFile()
        Create an HTML file that can be used to read local time via ScheduledActionManager.GetHttp(String, String, String).
        Since:
        1.0

      • generateLocalTimeFile

        private static void generateLocalTimeFile()
        Generates a local time offset file using an HTTP connection to the HTML file generated in writeLocalTimeHTMLFile(). The HTTP connection is authenticated using the configured FTP username and password from TWConnectorConsts.
        Since:
        1.0

      • parseOffsetFromLocalTime

        private static long parseOffsetFromLocalTime()
        Parses and returns the generated local time offset file from generateLocalTimeFile().
        Returns:
        local time offset
        Since:
        1.0
